# Episode Summary

This episode covers three major developments reshaping AI and data infrastructure: Anthropic's upgraded Responsible Scaling Policy (version 3) introduces stricter safety thresholds and distillation attack detection, signaling serious commitment to AI governance amid industry skepticism. Databricks launches Zerobus Ingest for real-time data pipelines and pushes toward fully declarative data engineering, addressing the operational complexity that's kept many organizations stuck between pilots and production.
